mapper.insert: insert into category (name, description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW())
